branchCategory.name: MHT2, Air Gripper, Toggle Style
branchCategory.description: <p>Gripper series MHT2&nbsp;includes a&nbsp;toggle mechanism is that is actuated to produce a strong and stable holding force, even when air pressure drops or is lost. The finger opening angle ranges from 28&deg; to -3&deg;.</p>
